title: Swords' Author Page
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:component:centered-header-sigma-9]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:toggle-sidebar]]

[[module CSS]]

:root{
     --titleColor: hsl(0, 0%, 95%);
     --subtitleColor: hsl(60, 62%, 85%);
     --lgurl: url(https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/689304077280215107/1021632930273054780/unknown.png);
}

 #header::before{
     position: absolute;
     width: 100%;
     height: 100%;
     content: "";
 
     background-image: var(--lgurl);
     background-position: center top;
     background-repeat: no-repeat;
     background-size: auto 8.5em;
     margin-top: 0.5em;
     opacity: .46;
}
 
#header h1 a::before {
    content: var(--header-title, "SCP Foundation");
}

#header h2::before {
    content: var(--header-subtitle, "Secure, Contain, Protect");
}

#header h1 a::before{
     text-shadow: 4px 4px 4px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, .8);
}

 #header h2::before{
     text-shadow: 3px 3px 3px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, .9);
}

 #header h1 a::before{
     font-family: BauhausLTDemi, 'Nanum Gothic', Arial, sans-serif;
     font-size: 115%;
}

 #header h2::before{
     font-family: 'Trebuchet MS', Arial, sans-serif;
}

#header h2::before {
    content: "Swords' Cool Pages";
}

 :root{
   --lgurl: url(https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/689304077280215107/966447407875387493/swords.png);
}

[[/module]]


[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

Hi, [[*user swordlover87]] (also known as Swords) here. I'm a sporadically active SCP author with a thing for antimemes and extraterrestrial anomalies. On this page you can find a variety of things:

* Everything I've written for this site, compiled for easy reading. 
* Rating statistics for my pages.
* Some art as a bonus.

Enjoy, and feel free to leave a vote and comment on anything you like[[footnote]] Or don't like [[/footnote]]!

@@ @@

------

@@ @@

If you got this far, you might enjoy my [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scpdeclassified SCP Declassifications] too. Iâ€™ve only made a couple but I think they came out well.

> [https://www.reddit.com/r/SCPDeclassified/comments/f53z2x/scp5008_hush/ SCP-5008 - HUSH], by [[*user rattles]]
> 
> //"The Foundation played right into the Keepersâ€™ hands, and now theyâ€™re likely not much more than a puppet for a long-dead will."// 

> [https://www.reddit.com/r/SCPDeclassified/comments/teovqn/scp5310_coalescenceintegrationorganism/ SCP-5310 - Coalescence/Integration/ORGANISM], by [[*user Tanhony]]
> 
> //"It's an awful feeling, to not be able to recognize your own friend anymore because the headspaces you're in are just too far apart."//
author: swordlover87
